title: Machine Learning-Based SMT Defect Analysis Expert Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistics, Understanding Surface Mount Technology (SMT) Processes, Foundations of Python Programming
context.additional_context: A case-based learning course using real AIOI data, focusing on strengthening defect analysis capabilities in production lines.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of P&P machine error types (nozzle size, nozzle picking position) on defect patterns in three or more ways
Learners can build Random Forest/XGBoost models based on AIOI inspection data to identify root causes of defects with over 85% accuracy
Learners can independently perform the entire process of preprocessing → feature engineering → model evaluation on actual SMT defect datasets in a Jupyter Notebook environment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
